ygData.subject: Koalindl Fishing  (Was: Selo's and SOW experiment and a bit on Koalindl Fish)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually you may pull it off if you re lucky. When I went after my Koalindl fish, one of the paladins was swimming in the far end of pool. I hit a fish and
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Donny Dane" <ddane@...>

>Well, if the guard is in the
>water, you cannot kill a fish without the guard fighting.

Actually you may pull it off if you're lucky.
When I went after my Koalindl fish, one of the paladins was swimming in the
far end of pool. I hit a fish and he jumped me,
so I zoned (at maybe 60% health) without killing the fish.

Well stubborn me is not gonna give up because of this. Jumped in to the pool
again (Paladin still there), targeted the fish and backed up against the
steps leading out of the pool.
When the fish came within range again I hit it with a bellow, killed it when
it arrived and quickly looted. This time the Paladin did not attack me!
Still get the faction hit of course, I was lucky to get the drop at the
first attempt.
Try it at your own risk =)

Of course all four Stein items turned No Drop on me before I could find my
trustworthy Enchanter so Im gonna try to finish the quest myself...wish me
luck lol.

Woland - lvl 22 bard who probably will be 21 again after a quick visit to
Oggok
